data.name: The Cult of Chanseville Demo
data.detailed_description:
*IMPORTANT NOTE*

The playable concept demo does not represent the final product. We are constantly working and listening to all possible feedback to develop the game in the best possible way!

We are trying to get resources to be able to hire developer's/artist's to work on the game!!


About the Game

"The Cult of Chanseville" is the sequel to our first short survival horror game "Understanding, The Game". due to the high reception and the massive support received and the miles of suggestions that people have brought in my first development, we have decided to create a new story paying attention to all the suggestions that the players have brought up. The Cult Of Chanseville is a twisted adventure into the depths of darkness that haunts the city and its dark secrets.

synopsis :

An evil cult tries to perform an ancient ritual in the city of Chanseville... terrible things are happening within the city, the darkness is gradually taking over everything around.

You play as a detective who arrives to Chanseville in search of answers for the murder of his wife and the lack of will of justice to advance the case.
we will have to survive this terrifying adventure where many surprises await us on the way in this city!

Features :

A walking simulator of Survival Horror Experience... in some cases you will be able to fight with some of your enemy's! "The Cult of Chanseville" are inspired by the most played classic horror games and aims to show a terrifying playable history.

We do not promise the best horror game, nor the most innovative, but we are putting all our love and dedication to achieve a game that you can enjoy playing and have a good time!

data.short_description: "The Cult of Chanseville" it's a suspense horror indie game inspired in classic horror games! Full Game Coming as soon we can!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 7, 10
  • Processor: AMD FX Six Core 6300 3.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: requires graphics card. minimum GPU needed: "AMD Radeon r7 200 series" or similar
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: intel i5 7400 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia gtx 1050 ti, or higher
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

data.legal_notice: [The Cult Of Chanseville] uses the Unreal® Engine. Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere.
